summary: Build and deploy a "Read Gita" section that displays verses in a 5-column table and includes complete verse data across all chapters.
known_issues: Table rows do not expand to show all cell content across 5 columns (content may be truncated).
Verse/chapter dataset is incomplete (not all verses for all chapters are populated).

existing_features.title: Update the Read Gita chapter verse table so each row expands vertically to display the full content of every cell across all 5 columns (no truncation/ellipsis) on both desktop and mobile layouts.

Populate the app with complete data for all verses across all chapters (full dataset coverage).
Populate backend verse data so the app contains verse records for every verse in every chapter (all 18 chapters), and ensure chapter verse counts match the returned verse list sizes.

projectName: Read Gita: Expand table rows to show full cell content and populate complete verse dataset
